subject: Re: [junit] JUnit in action book
msgSnippet: ... I had the opportunity to review _JUnit in Action_ and I highly recommend it to anyone who d like to see more of how to use JUnit in depth. It is
messageBody:
Vincent Massol wrote:

> Hi JUnit lovers,
>
> Sorry for this intrusion but I feel you might be interested to know that
> the JUnit in Action book has shipped.

I had the opportunity to review _JUnit in Action_ and I highly recommend
it to anyone who'd like to see more of how to use JUnit in depth. It is
/especially/ useful if you have just started using JUnit, but /anyone/
can learn from it.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
